scripts.build: node fix-production-env.js && cd frontend && npm ci --include=dev && NODE_ENV=production npm run build && cd ../backend && npm ci --omit=dev
scripts.build:clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const dir = path.join(__dirname, 'backend', 'public', 'assets'); if (fs.existsSync(dir)) fs.rmSync(dir, {recursive: true, force: true}); const html = path.join(__dirname, 'backend', 'public', 'index.html'); if (fs.existsSync(html)) fs.unlinkSync(html);" && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
